You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesV V] > &varr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&vArr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d5/index.htm U+021D5].
  * `&varr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2195/index.htm U+02195].
